name: Phantom Dream
description:
... is Myon ... dreaming? ...

Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right
Z - dash
X - attack

- Auto-Revive

Originally, the concept was about Youmu vs Kedama Army in Hakugyokurou with much more components e.g. wave slash, uppercut, ground slam, more enemy types/ attack types/ AI, etc, but I did not have enough time to implement all of those in time, unfortunately.
